title: Ergonomics

en: All these hours you're spending craning over your desk are doing a number on your back, and the resulting pain is affecting how well you work.
You can invest in some ergonomic office furniture, but it would cost quite a bit.

no_caption: I can stretch in my off hours

en: The investment pays off. You feel better, get more work done, and have more energy at the end of the day to boot!
You tell yourself you'll do stretches while working, and for a few days you do, but then it slips your mind. The pain ends up becoming a constant.
